name: @aurum-vault/backend
description: Aurum Vault Backend Services - Luxury Banking Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:admin
scripts.build:admin: cd ../admin-interface && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && npm run test:api && npm run test:admin
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:shared -- --coverage && npm run test:api -- --coverage && npm run test:admin -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:api && npm run lint:admin
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:shared -- --fix && npm run lint:api -- --fix && npm run lint:admin -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run format:shared && npm run format:api && npm run format:admin
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:api && npm run clean:admin
scripts.db:migrate: cd core-api && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: cd core-api && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd core-api && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd core-api && npx prisma migrate reset

author: Aurum Vault Development Team
